title: How have bicycle facilities improved in your city?

korean: 서울은 자전거 시설이 정말 많이 좋아진 것 같아요.
음, 제가 어렸을 때만 해도 자전거 도로가 거의 없었거든요.
근데 요즘은 한강 자전거 도로가 정말 잘 되어 있어요.
코스도 다양하고 중간중간 쉴 수 있는 공간도 많고요.
그리고 따릉이 같은 공공자전거 시스템이 생긴 게 제일 큰 변화인 것 같아요.
자전거가 없어도 스마트폰 하나로 쉽게 빌릴 수 있잖아요.
또 도심에도 자전거 전용 도로가 많이 생겼어요.
예전엔 차도에서 타야 돼서 위험했는데, 이제는 안전하게 탈 수 있죠.
정부에서도 자전거 이용을 장려하는 정책을 많이 하는 것 같아요.
앞으로 더 좋아질 것 같아서 기대돼요.
english: I think Seoul's bicycle facilities have improved a lot.
Um, when I was young, there were almost no bicycle paths.
But these days, the Hangang bicycle paths are really well-made.
There are various courses and many places to rest in between.
And I think the biggest change is the creation of public bike systems like Ttareungyi.
Even without a bike, you can easily rent one with just a smartphone.
Rental stations are at every subway station, so it's really convenient.
Also, many bicycle-only roads have been created in the city center.
Before, you had to ride on the road so it was dangerous, but now you can ride safely.
Bicycle parking facilities have also increased a lot.
The government also seems to be doing many policies to encourage bicycle use.
I'm looking forward to it getting even better in the future.
